introduction.html:div: The eBPM (eclipse Business Process Management For OSGi) project aims to realize a complete BPM solution for OSGi.

release_deliverables.html:div: The eBPM project is composed by 3 types of component's: Commons, Runtime, Tools The Runtime is the components that contains the eBPM core framework, and the standard eBPM services and connectors. The Tools are the Eclipse Plugins to develop/configure services, connectors and processes. The Commons component contains bundles/java project shared betweeb Runtime and Tools components. The eBPM project delivers server software running on Equinox OSGi framework
